package.name: costmap_3d
package.description: This package provides an implementation of a 3D costmap. The ROS 3D costmap is a specialization of the ROS 2D costmap interface for backwards compatability with existing navigation code. Additionally, it provides a new interface to find the cost of a stored robot mesh at a given pose using a MoveIt! planning scene. Also, the 3D costmap contains some standard 3D costmap plugins. The octomap_server plugin wraps an OctomapServer object as a 3D costmap layer. The OctomapServer is capable of serving static octomaps and/or build up sensor data into an octomap. This allows multiple layers of sensor data that does not cross-clear. The costmap_3d_to_2d_layer plugin forwards the 3D costmap data to the 2D costmap.
